General.Name: Hironic Co. Ltd
General.Description: Hironic Co., Ltd. provides aesthetic medical devices in South Korea and internationally. It offers its products for the treatment of skin rejuvenation, face lifting, body shaping, acne, vaginal tightening, and hair transplantation and removal, as well as for the vascular and pigmented treatments. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Yongin-si, South Korea.
